channel.title: SMTP server for my SMF
channel.description: My webhost does not seem to have SMTP (free and crap, of course). Is there anyway to fix this (or does someone have a SMTP server or something (I've tried multiple hosts and they either don't work or don't have SMTP).

My webhost does not seem to have SMTP (free and crap, of course). Is there anyway to fix this (or does someone have a SMTP server or something (I’ve tried multiple hosts and they either don’t work or don’t have SMTP).
